abilities.name: Nostalgic Return
abilities.description: When played, return a unit that died this game to your hand. It costs 2 less

abilities.name: Innocent Joy
abilities.description: Your units with cost 3 or less have +1/+1

body.raw:
# Six of Cups

Childhood memories bring comfort and renewed innocence.

*"In remembering our past, we find our future."*
